message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $12,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $12,000 is a bit high. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective. How about we meet in the middle at $10,500?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. Can you consider my revised offer?
